name: ERC Transcend HE Media Conference 2018
description:
As an annual occurrence the Third Years of the BA in Contemporary Media, Design and Production of East Riding College host a media focused conference. This year falls to the students of 2015 â€“ 2018 showcasing various talents and works that they have created over the three years of study.
Join us for an afternoon with talks and various works from third years, Lewis Singleton, Chris Wood, Sam Milner, Dan Taylor-Crossland, second year degree students and special guest Graphic Designer Adam Kerr.

photo.alt: Students getting ready for the ERC Transcend Conference
